It all started back when...


   ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dach=
ande 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
 =
 Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::=

   
      They had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed=
 no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they we=
re leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed fa=
r away

  So I responded with...
  . 
  Razor Claw saw the three bots leavi=
ng the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. =
he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the=
 three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot=
 mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be =
forced to, your choice."

  Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking th=
em until finally Optimus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime =
to recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. an=
d Razor Claw caught up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought i=
t was those three that were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

  He aproached t=
he three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacef=
ully

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 5:26 PM
  Subject: Re: Dacha=
nde respond or else


  They never really saw the fight, but if you want to=
 roleplay it then resend me the message.

=

    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, =
January 31, 2001 8:06 PM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    I =
know, and Razor Claw is a mutant based on a Predacon protoform that fought
=
    alongside the maximals at the CF. and has been tracking them since they=
 ran
    from the fight.
    ----- Original Message -----
    From: <Dachan=
de85@...>

nuary 31, 2001 11:00 AM

hose three characters are not Predacons, they are Maximals.
